button.pay.description: Button text for paying an order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing to pay an order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for checking order details.

button.query.description: Button text for querying an order.

button.finish.description: Button text for manually completing an order.

button.update.description: Button text for updating an order.

field.amount.description: The amount of points for the order.

field.price.description: The amount of points for the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of an order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method of an order.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service used for data transmission as an HTTP proxy.

message.orderExpired.message: Order has expired. Please create a new order to proceed with payment.
message.orderExpired.description: Message indicating that an order has expired.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your mobile device and scan to complete the payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete payment on the external link provided.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message indicating payment via an external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to paid status and complete distribution processing. This action cannot be undone. Please confirm that the customer has completed the payment. Do you want to continue?
message.confirmFinish.description: Confirmation message for finishing an order.

state.pending.description: Status of an order indicating it is awaiting payment from the user.

state.paid.description: Status of an order indicating it has been paid.

state.expired.description: Status of an order indicating payment timeout.

state.failed.description: Status of an order indicating payment failure.

title.info.description: Title used for the website, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating WeChat Pay.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for the website, indicating Alipay, an online payment service.

title.stripe.description: Title used for the website, indicating Stripe, an online payment service.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for the website, indicating managing orders.
